001package edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.viewmodel;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.content.res.Resources;
005import android.util.Log;
006import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
007import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
008import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
009import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
010import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
011import androidx.lifecycle.Transformations;
012import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
013import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
014import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.R;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.Dealer;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.Field;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.service.PlayingFieldRepository;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.service.PreferencesRepository;
020import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
021import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observable;
022import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
023import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
024import javax.inject.Inject;
025import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
026
027@HiltViewModel
028public class PlayingFieldViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
029
030  private final PlayingFieldRepository playingFieldRepository;
031  private final PreferencesRepository preferencesRepository;
032  private final MutableLiveData<Boolean> moveSuccess;
033  private final LiveData<Boolean> inProgress;
034  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
035  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
036  private final String playingFieldWidthKey;
037  private final int playingFieldWidthDefault;
038
039  @Inject
040  PlayingFieldViewModel(@ApplicationContext Context context,
041      PlayingFieldRepository playingFieldRepository,
042      PreferencesRepository preferencesRepository) {
043    this.playingFieldRepository = playingFieldRepository;
044    this.preferencesRepository = preferencesRepository;
045    moveSuccess = new MutableLiveData<>();
046    inProgress = Transformations.map(playingFieldRepository.getPlayingField(), 
047        (field) -> !field.isGameOver());
048    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
049    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
050    Resources resources = context.getResources();
051    playingFieldWidthDefault = resources.getInteger(R.integer.playing_field_width_default);
052    playingFieldWidthKey = resources.getString(R.string.playing_field_width_key);
053    create();
054  }
055
056  public LiveData<Field> getPlayingField() {
057    return playingFieldRepository.getPlayingField();
058  }
059
060  public LiveData<Dealer> getDealer() {
061    return playingFieldRepository.getDealer();
062  }
063
064  public LiveData<Boolean> getRunning() {
065    return Transformations.distinctUntilChanged(playingFieldRepository.getRunning());
066  }
067
068  public LiveData<Boolean> getMoveSuccess() {
069    return moveSuccess;
070  }
071
072  public LiveData<Boolean> getInProgress() {
073    return Transformations.distinctUntilChanged(inProgress);
074  }
075
076  public LiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
077    return throwable;
078  }
079
080  public void create() {
081    int width = preferencesRepository.get(playingFieldWidthKey, playingFieldWidthDefault);
082    execute(playingFieldRepository.create(25, width, 5, 5)); // FIXME: 10/9/23 Replace with values from preferences.
083  }
084
085  public void run() {
086    execute(playingFieldRepository.run());
087  }
088
089  public void stop() {
090    playingFieldRepository.stop();
091  }
092
093  public void moveLeft() {
094    execute(playingFieldRepository.moveLeft());
095  }
096
097  public void moveRight() {
098    execute(playingFieldRepository.moveRight());
099  }
100
101  public void rotateLeft() {
102    execute(playingFieldRepository.rotateLeft());
103  }
104
105  public void rotateRight() {
106    execute(playingFieldRepository.rotateRight());
107  }
108
109  public void drop() {
110    execute(playingFieldRepository.drop(false));
111  }
112
113  @Override
114  public void onPause(@NonNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
115    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onPause(owner);
116    Log.d(getClass().getSimpleName(), "Pausing...");
117    stop();
118  }
119
120  @Override
121  public void onStop(@NotNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
122    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onStop(owner);
123    pending.clear();
124  }
125
126  private void execute(Single<Boolean> task) {
127    moveSuccess.postValue(null);
128    throwable.postValue(null);
129    task.subscribe(
130        moveSuccess::postValue,
131        this::postThrowable,
132        pending
133    );
134  }
135
136  private void execute(Completable task) {
137    moveSuccess.postValue(null);
138    throwable.postValue(null);
139    task.subscribe(
140        () -> {},
141        this::postThrowable,
142        pending
143    );
144  }
145
146  private void execute(Observable<Boolean> task) {
147    moveSuccess.postValue(null);
148    throwable.postValue(null);
149    task.subscribe(
150        moveSuccess::postValue,
151        this::postThrowable,
152        () -> {},
153        pending
154    );
155  }
156
157  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
158    Log.e(getClass().getSimpleName(), throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
159    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
160  }
161
162}
